inn1.comm: in the zone outside off stump, left alone and Hopkins, the keeper, gathers it
short in length outside off stump, punched out to cover
stays on the back foot and taps it to the off side
edged past the second slip. This was fuller in length and Vijay leaned forward, and searched for the ball ..  bat away from the body
in the zone outside off stump and Gambhir is beaten, pushing inside the line. the ball rolls to Hopkins.
Beaten again. Gambhir goes for a flamboyant on-the-up off drive but the ball seams back in and goes through the bat and pad gap ... between the off stump and the bat
starts off with a wide down the leg side
leans forward to defend a length delivery to the off side
in the zone outside off and Vijay shoulders arms
gets forward to tap it slightly wide of Guptill at short midwicket for a single
length delivery down the leg side and the keeper collects
beaten again. Gambhir has a tentative poke at a delivery leaving him and the ball rushes past the edge
tip and run .. pushes it to the off side and rushes for a quick single
in the channel outside off stump, left alone
lands on a length on the off and middle and moves back in .. Gambhir taps it close on the leg side, towards square-leg, and they get across for a quick single
seams away from the off stump line, pushed out to the off
leans forward to punch this to mid-off
on the middle stump line, Vijay leans across and works it to square-leg fielder
shout for lbw ... high .i guess .It cut in from outside off and Vijay was caught on the walk forward ...it looked high
clips this one through wide mid-on region and pushes hard to come for the third run
full in length outside off stump, pushed out to cover
leans forward to defend to the off
Shot! He leans well forward to drive the short-of-length delivery on the up and in style through covers
Slog! He cleared the front foot and smashed the short of length delivery to the square-leg boundary
leans forward to defend and is hit on the pad outside off stump. And the ball bounds off to Hopkins. No bat involved, though.
gets forward to mistime the drive to left of mid-on
full in length outside off stump, pushed out to cover
leans back and shapes for the pull but edges it to his back pad
from wide of the crease, moves in towards the middle, worked to short midwicket
Fab timing. It was a length delivery on the middle and Vijay just leaned forward and seemed to just push at it. Gorgeous piece of timing and the ball ran away between the umpire and Gambhir.
in the zone outside off, left alone
Stylish. A touch of VVS. He glided forward, picked the length delivery from the off stump line and wristed it through midwicket
taps this length delivery to point
length delivery around the off, Gambhir pushes it to cover
He rushed down the track, got outside leg in the process and smashed this one over cover
on the hips, tucked down to fine-leg for a single
fullish, outside off, driven neatly to right of mid-off where Kane Williamson makes a diving half-stop
on a length around the off, pushed out to the off side
moves down the track, again gets outside leg in the process, and flays a short-of-length delivery through extra cover.
stays back to punch a length delivery to cover
Crunched! It was slightly shortish and Vijay jumped at the opportunity and unfurled a nonchalant pull shot
short again, at the body, pulled away again but this time straight to short fine-leg fielder
fullish, on the middle, Vijay gets a leading edge towards mid-off
around the off stump line, run down to third man
full in length, on the off, pushed to right of mid-on
Adrenalin rush takes him out. Vijay walked down the track and went for the big lofted hit over midwicket and it flew high and behind the keeper! Hopkins turned and ran back to collect a good catch
in the channel outside off, left alone
fullish, straight, on driven to mid-on
sprays to the pads and Gambhir whip-flicks it to the boundary. Easy pickings
on a length around off, Gambhir edges the drive to his pad
drives to left of mid-off for a single
moves away from Gautam who runs it down to third man for a single
on a length around off, pushed to cover
on the middle stump line, defended to the on side
around the off stump line, pushed out to point

shout for a catch behind and the bowler looks mighty pissed off .. It cut in from outside off stump and moved past the inner edge and flew through the bat and pad gap .. There was some noise, no visible deflection,though, on the replays. Hopkins did well to lunge to his left to take it
leans forward to push this to the on side
moves down the track, gets outside leg and carves the length delivery over point
leans forward to work this to square-leg
fullish outside off, driven to mid-off
full in length around off, on driven to mid-on
length delivery and some width outside off,  square driven for three runs.. Gambhir dives to get back inside the line. Just in time.
short in length, tapped to right of gully
works this behind square-leg for a single
on the pads, tucked behind square-leg
length delivery outside off, tapped to gully
And again
walks down the track and stabs a off cutter to gully
gets forward to steer it to point
starts off full and wide, and is driven away for one
tucked away into the leg side for one
driven past cover for another single
flicked into the leg side, from off and around, and rushes through for a quick single to midwicket
short and wide, punched away to sweeper-cover
sees him walk down the track and digs it in short, angled down the leg side, and is called a wide. Pretty harsh this, because it would have missed the leg-side line only by inches
and the extra ball is flicked away for four, in the air all right, but wide enough of the flying mid-on
wristy, flicked away from wide outside off, to square leg for one
oh what was that? It just kicked out of nowhere. Was bowled at a gentle pace of 111ks, but it rose head-high from a short of a length, getting Gambhir is the glove but it lobs safely towards cover
fuller, clipped away off the pads for one
quick running here, guiding this fine of fine leg and rushing back for the second
short of a length, just outside off, defended
short and wide, and Kohli gives it the treatment, cutting it between point and cover-point
short outside off, runs this to third man for one
too wide outside off, and this call is not harsh at all
punched away square, Gauptill makes a dive at point and saves one run
moves across to get inside the line of this, and clips it away for one
angling into the pads, turned away to square leg
length ball, around off, defended to leg
again he walks at the bowler, turning this length ball into a half-volley, and driving it square for four
dabs this to the on side
works this behind square-leg for couple of runs
short in length on the off and middle, worked to deep midwicket
leans forward to square drive this for a single
fuller, straighter, worked to short midwicket
around the off stump line, defended to the off
sprays this one down the leg side. He had bowled a probing spell to Gambhir in the third Test
fullish, on the middle, pushed out to the off
what a soft dismissal. It was wide outside the off stump and Gambhir reached out to carve it tamely to point. Gone!
serves a bouncer first-up to Yuvraj who sways away
Yet another bouncer and this time, Yuvraj ducks
just outside off stump, pushed out to cover
shortish, chopped down to cover point
leans forward to tap it back down the track
dabs this to short midwicket
full in length, eased towards long-on
stays back to punch it through wide mid-off
leans well forward to defend to the off
stays back to dab this to the leg side
gets behind the line to push it back to McKay
and this time he eases it to mid-off
slower one, off cutter but its short in length and sits up outside off, Kohli reaches out and drags it through midwicket
clips this through midwicket for a single
gets back to push it towards mid-on
spins down the leg side
pushes this to point for a quick single
on the pads, turned to backward square-leg fielder
leans well forward to defend to the on side
edged but flies safely over the bowler .. Yuvraj was trying to flick it to the on side - it landed outside leg and turned in to clip the leading edge and flew high over the bowler
goes back to dab it to square-leg
leans well forward to nudge to short midwicket
leans forward to push-drive this to the off
on drives this to long-on for a single
on the pads, flicked past square-leg for a single
leans well forward to tap this to the on side
fullish outside off, on driven to long-on
flicks this to square-leg
goes back to defend this turning off break to short midwicket
generous turn there, worked behind square-leg
turns away from a full length, for some reason Yuvraj shapes to cut and is beaten
lands outside leg and turns in to hit the pad
goes back to punch to short extra cover
just outside off, pushed to point for a single
off cutter around the off, edged to short third man
around the off stump, pushed to point
punched down to long-on
leans across to deflect it past square-leg
fullish, on the middle, tapped to short cover
turns in to the middle and off, defended on the back foot
And again.
fullish outside off, leans forward to drive to wide of sweeper cover
leans forward to defend it to the off
just outside off, turning away, steered to short third man
pushes this to short extra cover
stays back to push to the off
off cutter outside off, pushed through point for a single
fullish, on the middle, flicked through midwicket
gets back to clip it past midwicket for a single
cuts away from Yuvraj who is beaten, trying to steer it
leans forward to defend down the track.
goes back to clip it to midwicket
leans well forward to defend to the on
sweeps this to square-leg for a single
spins down the leg side,, Kohli goes for the big pull shot but the ball stops on him and bounds off the glove to the on side

plays another sweep to get off strike. Whoa! he has struck it really neatly. .. The ball races away to the fien-leg boundary. I thought .. there we go .. just a single .. but he had placed it really well.
Punched! He has woken up all right. He cleared the front foot and heaved this one to the wide midwicket boundary
on the middle stump line, tickled down to fine-leg region
short in length on the middle and leg , dragged down to fine-leg region
fullish, on driven to long-on
leans forward to drive to cover
gets back, clears front foot and forces it through the on side for a single
stretches well forward to nudge this to the on side
leans forward to drive to cover
full delivery outside off and Yuvraj Singh crashes it to the cover boundary
floated full outside off stump, .. Yuvraj leaned forward to defend and at the last second, opened the bat-face and ran the ball through vacant slips!
full outside off, taken on the pad
gets back and punches this to short midwicket
on the middle stump, keeps a touch low, worked to short midwicket
on the middle and off line, worked behind square-leg
lapped around the corner! It was a short of length delivery on the off and middle, Yuvjraj bent his knees and short-arm pulled it .. sort of a lapped it around the corner, to the square-leg boundary
leans forward to drive to the off
on the middle stump line, turned to square-leg
gets forward to drive to short extra cover
lets Hopkins collect this one
Gets down on his knee and sweeps this one really hard to the square-leg boundary. Walloped.
turns away from Yuvraj who punches it to cover
in the zone outside off, left alone
gets forward to on drive it to long-on
leans forward to defend it back down the track
on the leg stump line, swept down to deep backward square-leg

shortish, Virat opens up his stance by clearing the front foot and pulls it hard to the square-leg boundary. NZ had two chances to stop it but both square-leg fielder and deep midwicket make a mess of it
turns down to the pads, Virat presses back and glances it to the fine-leg region. 50 up for Virat. His 9th ODI fifty.
stretches forward and across and drives to the cover boundary. Styris throws in a  dive but is unable to stop it India charge on to a great position here.
leans forward to defend to cover
And again. This time of the back foot
short in length on the off, punched back to the bowler who makes a half-stop-
length delivery outside off, eased down to long-off
width offered outside off, flashed to sweeper cover
on the middle stump line, driven past the bowler
from round the stumps, shortish delivery, tucked down to fine-leg region
full in length around off, jabbed out to the off
on the pads, rolls away towards short midwicket
cuts in from outside off, dabbed towards backward point
punches this to mid-off
mistimes this drive to cover
on a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
around the off, steered to backward point
Thwack! Shortish delivery that sits up to be punished. A pretty masochistic delivery. Yuvraj puts it out of its misery with a thumping pull to wide long-on boundary
gets forward to tap this to the off
on a length around off, steered to backward point
leans forward to drive back to the bowler
leans forward to defend solidly to cover
from round the stumps, tapped wide of short midwicket .. Nathan puts in a slide and lets the ball slip from his hands as he was about to throw  .. one extra run
wristed to right of midwicket for a single
Ouch. Hit on the body by the bouncer. He tried to sway away from it but the ball kept coming in and hit his chest.
cuts this past backward point for a single
on the pads, clipped away for a single
fullish outside off, driven to deep cover
Full in length, in the zone outside off and inviting a drive; Yuvraj obliges but drives inside the line and gets the edge.
fullish around off, driven to mid-off
overpitched on the middle and Raina whips it away elegantly well to the left of mid-on
on a length outside off, jabbed away to the off
in the channel outside off, left alone
gets forward to ping long-on
leans across to push to cover
turns away from the off, forced to sweeper cover
leans forward to flick to square-leg
gets on the back foot to punch to short midwicket
on the back foot, pushed to point
on the middle stump line, flicked away to deep square-leg ... Guptill slides and pushes it towards his partner .. well .. slightly wide of Styris who stops and turns ... extra runs
around the off stump, pushed to point
leans forward to tap it towards mid-on and runs with the stroke
bangs it in short and Virat plays a stylish pull to the wide midwicket boundary
leans forward to drive to cover
slower off cutter, worked to short midwicket
leans forward to drive to long-off
on the pads ,clipped to deep square-leg for couple of runs
leans forward to ease it back to the bowler
floated outside off stump line, dragged down to long-on
leans across to steer it past point
shortish, spins down the leg side, Virat goes for the pull but the turn and the line meant he ended up dragging it to fine-leg region
around the off stump line, punched to long-off
works this one to short midwicket
fullish outside off, driven to left of long-off
on the pads, turned behind square-leg for a single
leans forward to drag this to long-on
around the off stump line, steered to short third man for a single
outside off stump, short in length, forced to sweeper cover
Wallop! Slightly short and that's all the invitation Kohli needs. He cleared the front foot, went back and pulled it superbly to the wide midwicket boundary
leans forward to ease it down to long-on
steered to right of short third man
leans forward to work it from outside off to short midwicket
presses back to square cut this to the point boundary. Again,he was quick to move as soon as he picked the length. blink. back foot. Cut.
backs away from the stumps and has a swing and a miss
Another slog and a miss. This time the ball bounces over the middle stump. Raina reaches the other end and smiles
punches this towards mid-on for a single
backs away from the stumps and tries to smash through the line and on the up. No luck. He ends up skiing it to long-off.
works this through midwicket for a single
No time wasted in bouncing at Yusuf Pathan who hopped to stab at it in an ungainly manner and was hit on the shoulder of the bat. Hmmm. Here we go
from round the stumps, on the middle, punched to long-on
short delivery that doesn't climb that much, Yusuf shuffles across to lap it around the corner .. fine-leg was up in the circle and he will pick up a boundary
A beauty! It was full in length from round the wicket and left Yusuf late. Very late. He was squared-up in defense and the ball rushed past the outside edge
More trouble. Another short delivery, this time just outside off and he is beaten, trying to glide it through slips
fuller, on the middle stump, swat-flicked to deep square-leg
the slower one, banged in short,, well outside off and Virat can't reach it
fullish, on the pads, flicked away to deep square-leg region
moves to the pad and rolls to short fine-leg for a leg bye
almost caught by Eliott at deep backward square-leg. It was the slower one .. flicked uppishly towards Elliot who ran forward and lunged out but couldn't hold on
backs away from the stumps and pulls the short-of-length delivery to wide long-on boundary. Crunched.
pushed to covers for a single
short in length, on the middle, worked to the leg side for a single
a pump of the fist, a jump for joy, and a big smile at the end of it. It was the shortish delivery outside off and Virat guides it to the third man boundary. Second hundred in a row.
overpitched delivery outside off and Yusuf crashes it to the cover boundary
banged in short this time and Yusuf mistimes a pull.. the ball rolls behind square-leg
leans forward to drive to cover
the slow bouncer outside off and Virat is too early with his pull .. the ball bounces once before it reaches the keeper
Bosh. He knifed this one  .. It was short in length and he short-arm pulled it through wide mid-on region

Virat falls after another big innings. Short and wide; the slower bouncer, he reached out to tamely tap it to cover! A highest of 37 in seven games but he has changed things around now with two consecutive hundreds.
short in length outside off, pushed to mid-off for a single
leans forward to push it to point ..  Yusuf slips while turning back and the throw comes to his end .. overthrows ..
the slower one, dragged dangerously past short fine-leg fielder
leans forward to drive through covers
gets forward and across to drive it to short cover
short in length around off, gets an inside edge to short fine-leg
In the channel outside off, from round the wicket, Saha stabs away from the body and gets a thin edge through to the keeper.
around the off stump line. pushed out to point

Andy McKay is on a roll here. A well-directed bouncer has Ashwin playing a lame pull. He was so late on it.  The ball just goes straight up and McKay himself gets under it,. It was a surprise that McKay played just one Test in the recent series.
nearly another one. This one landed around off and left Nehra late .. It whooshed past the edge
fuller, outside off and Nehra stabs inside the line and is beaten
And again. Action replay and all that. McKay shuts his eyes as he throws his head back in disbelief
goes for the big swing over the on side but ends up dragging it past square-leg
leans forward to defend to the off
short in length outside off, tapped to point
Nehra is run out. He went back to tap it towards short cover for a quick single. Taylor rushed in, picked up, turned around and fired a direct hit at the non-striker's end
yorker length, well nearly, dug out towards mid-on
Whack. It was a short delivery, not quite a bouncer, below chest-high, and Yusuf pulls it over midwicket boundary
Bosh. short in length and Yusuf smashes it on the up and over mid-off. Neatly done.

fine fielding effort  from Guptill. It was the short pitched delivery and Yusuf flat batted it high towards long-on. Guptill jumped back to "catch" it and realised that he was going to fall beyond the boundary and some how managed to release the ball just in time. Stunning effort. Catch it on the youtube.  Yusuf was so confident that it would be a six (or he thought he was out!) and didn't run till Guptill flicked the ball  back into play
leans forward to defend it back down the track
edged Fullish delivery outside off and Sreesanth edges it to third man boundary ..
in the zone outside off and Sreesanth is beaten, driving inside the line

What a drop from Guptill What a clanger. What an effort in the last over and what a mess now! It was swung straight to him at deep midwicket and he has put it down! Too many what a ... in that line eh!
Full toss. Blink. Caught at cover.   Yusuf falls after a 19-ball 29. He made contact with the bottom of the bat on this occasion.
fullish, pushed away for a single
bouncer that flies over the flashing blade
goes down the track and bottom-edges an intended flat-batted whack
moves down the track and mows it straight down wide long-on throat. And India all out 276

inn2.comm: short in length, on the stumps, turned to square-leg
in the zone outside off, left alone
leans forward to defend the full delivery back down the track
around the off stump line and Guptill plays a classy straight punch down the ground. Neatly done
in the zone outside off, left alone
length delivery around the off stump line, defended to the off
around the off stump line, pushed to the off
shout for lbw but it was going high. Or so it seemed. It cut back in from outside off and he pushed outside the line
outside off stump line ,edged to third man
fullish delivery, dug out to the on side
on the middle and leg, turned to square-leg
in the outside off stump, left alone
keeps a touch low outside off and goes past the surprised How
leans forward to defend to the off side
cuts in to the take the edge to square-leg .. the throw comes to non-strikers end and they take another run for the overthrow
lands outside leg and hits the pad
gets forward to mistime the drive back to the bowler
leans forward to defend to the off
Whack! He glided forward to blast it on the up and through the line. he nearly took out the umpire there
moves in from the off, pushed back down the track
in the zone outside off, Guptill lets the keeper take it
Wallop! Sreesanth drops this slightly short and Guptill stands on one leg and pulls it high over wide midwicket
leans forward to tap this to mid-off
gets forward to squeeze this back to Sreesanth
gets forward and across to punch it through extra cover
angles it across the batsman who shoulders arms
around the off stump line, pushed out to the off
here comes the bouncer but it sails harmlessly well over the batsman.
full in length around off, defended on the front foot
short in length outside off, chopped to point
full and in the channel outside off, Guptill goes for a big  drive down the ground but no wood on leather
cuts in to the middle, worked behind square-leg
length delivery outside off and Guptill slices it over point! Lash em!
around the off stump, on a length, driven to mid-off
Imperious! Fabulicious strike! He leaned forward and lofted it high over the ump's head. Lovely swing of the bat.
slower one around off, defended to the off
really slow leg break and Guptill waits. And he waits. He then lofts it towards the long-off boundary .. the fielder rushes back to pull it back in time

What a mess-up from Sreesanth at deep backward square-leg! IT was clipped to him and he let it right through! Nehra has a whimsical look on his face. The camera shifts to Gambhir. Surprisingly, no one abused!
leans across to defend to the off
in the zone outside off, pushed out to Raina at cover
Vijay made that look easy. It was the short delivery and was pulled low to his right at short midwicket.  A mistimed shot. He lunged to collect that.
Another bouncer and more trouble. It was fended off in an ungainly manner and the ball popped up to the off .. no one there ..
hangs on the back foot to defend
on the middle stump line, tapped to short midwicket
leans forward to drag it to wide long-on region
on the middle stump line, eased past square-leg

low full toss, swung towards wide long-on where Vijay rushed out and threw in a dive but couldn't reach it.. he moved to the right of the ball and then dived .. so there was no body behind it. As opposed to that Jadeja catch of Alan Border in the 1992 WC
full toss again, pushed down to wide long-on for a single
around the leg stump line, nudged down to fine-leg region
on the off stump line, pushed out to cover
dropped by Vijay at short midwicket. Not easy. It was shortish and was pulled  hard to left of Vijay who stretched his hand out but couldn't hold on to the really sharp chance. Nehra holds his head.
leans forward to nudge this to cover point
around the off stump line, defended on the back foot
gets back to punch it to left of mid-off for a single
slower one on the pads, turned to short midwicket
goes down the track and mistimes the drive. . He hits it uppishly but falls short of mid-on where Munaf does well to lunge out to stop it
gets forward to ping long-on
gets back to punch it down to long-on
spins to the pad, worked to backward square-leg fielder
around the off stump, eased back to Ashwin
Done in the flight. It was tossed up outside off and Guptill dragged the lofted hit towards long-off. Munaf Patel rushed forward and lunged out to take a good catch
on a length outside off, edged down to third man
full in length and in the zone outside off, left alone
leans across to punch it through cover point
length delivery outside off, driven to right of short extra cover where Gambhir lunges out but doesn't stop it cleanly. Perhaps, he got an awkward bounce
short in length around off, punched to point
comes in from outside off, pushed out to the off
around the off stump, defended to point
leans forward to defend it back down the pitch
spins in from outside off, pushed back to Ash
loopy delivery, full, eased back the bowler
sharp turn there, backs away to stab it to cover point
And completes the maiden with a flighted delivery around off which has been defended back to him
on the middle stump line, defended to the on side
leans forward to defend the length delivery to the off
moves in towards middle and off, pushed back down the track
works this to short midwicket
shout for a run out. It was pushed to left of mid-off for a quick single. Yuvraj with the direct hit but Taylor was home.
works this behind square-leg
gets forward to nudge and the ball rolls of the pad
leans forward to square drive to cover point
spins down the leg for a wide
on the middle and leg, full, pushed out to the on side
leans forward to deflect to short midwicket
shimmies down the track, Munaf shortens the length, KW pushes him to short extra cover
back of a length, around off, no room, played back to Munaf
fuller, but no room still, pushed straight to Raina at short extra cover
and Munaf handcuffs KW again. he comes down the track, and again finds zero room, and the length is too short for driving
bouncer, 132ks, forget the pace, it is a good surprise delivery, KW is clearly not expecting it, and ducks under it late
first loose delivery of the over, clipped away to long leg for one
steered to short third man
paddled away for a single
looks to play to on, the slowness gets the leading edge but it falls short of Raina at short extra
moves across to defend this back to Yuvraj
turn there, Taylor gets a thick outside edge as he looks to defend
moves across, Yuvraj sees him, and bowls down the leg side, getting turn too, and Taylor defends it back to him
tucked away off the hip for a single
moves across to get inside the line and clip it away to deep square leg for one
driven on the up, but finds mid-off
slower ball, 117ks, played towards short midwicket
good job by captain Gambhir at mid-off, diving to his right to field this drive
bowls the bouncer, and Williamson ducks under it
on the off stump line, eased down to long-off
another single down to long-off
leans forward to drive to extra cover where Raina fumbles
on the middle and leg, pushed back to Yuvraj
outside the off stump, punched down to long-on
tossed up outside off on a length, driven over cover for couple of runs
on the middle and leg, turned to square-leg
on the middle stump line, pushed to the on side for a single
full in length, around off, tapped close to the off side for a single
gets well forward to defend to the off
goes down the track, Munaf shortens the length, Kane tries to biff it to the on side and ends up mistiming it and flat-batting it towards mid-off
banged in short, worked behind square-leg for a single
floated full outside off, driven to sweeper cover
around the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
on the off stump line, slight turn, pushed to short extra cover
around the off stump line, deflected to short midwicket
sweeps this around the corner for a single
on the off stump line, tapped back to the bowler. Hmmm
shortish, Taylor mistimes the pull shot but gets it wide of deep midwicket fielder
length delivery around off, pushed to cover
on the middle and off, can only push it to short midwicket. Munaf is bowling a stumps-to-stumps line and they are unable to work him around
slightly short, just outside off, cut down to wide third man region ..
stays back to force this one but straight to sweeper cover
leans forward to push this length delivery back to Munfa
paddles this down to fine-leg region where Munaf does well to stop it with his boot . just in time.
rocks back to cut this to sweeper cover
leans across to play another paddle sweep, to the right of Munaf at fine-leg
turns past the outside edge. Taylor was looking to tap it to point
again it spins away from Rosco who adjusts, waits and opens the bat-face to run it towards third man boundary. Virat rushes back to pull it back just in time
sweeps this from outside off for a single
goes right back to pull it to Ashwin at deep midwicket
on the off and middle, worked to square-leg
Smashed! short and going down the leg side and Rosco pulls it to the recycle bin. He swung it over backward square-leg boundary
thunderous wallop! He went down on his knee and hammered this full delivery over midwicket boundary
turns this to fine-leg region for a single
gets forward to ping long-on
outside the off stump line, pushed to cover point .. Gambhir fires a direct hit at the non-striker's end but Kane was home
floated full outside off, squeezed to point
quicker, on the middle, pushed to midwicket
goes back to punch it through the off side for a single
fullish, on the off, worked through to deep midwicket
slightly short outside off, forced down to Ash at sweeper cover
flighted on the off, pushed to midwicket
floated outside off, driven to sweeper cover
turns from outside off stump, defended on the front foot
That carrom ball! lovely delivery... Taylor just about withdraws his bat from the line of trouble
Nicely done late cut. It was the quickish delivery around the off stump line. Taylor dabbed it late and got it clear of the diving short third0man fielder
leans forward to nudge it to the on side and is struck on the pad outside off

short of length delivery outside off and Kane went for the cut but  must have got a thin bottom edge ..... Yuvraj was running towards the keeper before he stopped and turned for the appeal . Up went the finger.
loud shout for lbw. It was the full delivery, landed on off and middle and straightened. Styris went for the paddle and was struck on the pad. Close call. Was it turning away from the off stump?
leans forward to defend to the off
taps this one back to the bowler
fullish around off, worked through midwicket
around the off, pushed to point
turns from off, deflected to short fine-leg fielder
turns in from outside off, stabbed to the off
on the middle, tickled down to left of short fine-leg fielder
flighted full around off, whipped to right of Yusuf at long-on
the carrom ball that landed just outside leg and came in .. Rosco had shuffled towards off and just about manages to lunge out and stab
walks across and defends to the on
leans forward to nudge this to backward point
just outside off, cut down to backward point
plays the paddle shot to rotate the strike
leans forward to push it to cover point
outside off stump, bunted to the on side
short in length, a tad quicker, punched down to long-on. 50 up for Rosco He has to carry on for a big hundred if NZ are pull this one off. Can he?
leans forward to tap to short midwicket
shout for lbw but it perhaps was going down the leg side. Taylor goes for the swing to the on side and is hit on the pad
leans forward to ping long-on
floated full around off and Styris plays an elegant drive. He leaned forward to drive it superbly through extra cover  Lovely timing
works this down to long-on
on the middle and leg and Taylor drags it to the fine-leg boundary. Nice swing of the bat this time and good connection made
around the off stump line, guided through backward point. He opened the bat-face and steered it with the turn
around the off, pushed out to backward point

It was an arm-ball and around the off stump and Scotty went for the cut shot. The ball flew quickly to first slip where Yusuf does well to take it on the rebound. And yuvraj seems to say "I told you, I will get him" to Raina who is rushing to congratulate him.
slip and gully in and Yuvraj spears it down to the pads. Eliott helps it along to the fine-leg boundary
leans well forward to defend to the on side. Bat and then pad.
slower, fuller, driven to long-off
in the channel outside off, left alone
on the off stump line, pushed to point
Another catch for Yusuf at first slip. It landed on a length around off and straightened. Elliott was squared-up and stabbed it of the outer edge straight to Yusuf
fuller, around off, driven to right of sweeper cover
it was on the hips, clipped past square-leg
wayward bouncer .. too high
around the off stump line, pushed out to point
on the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
almost caught by Virat at deep midwicket. It was swung towards Virat who rushed to his left and lunged but couldn't hold on
around the off stump line, pushed to point
One more Yuvraj. The collapse is on. It was flighted outside off and driven straight to short cover
just outside the off stump, punched out to sweeper cover
around the off stump, squeezed to short third man
in the zone outside off, pushed out to point
on the off stump, run down to third man
cuts in from the off, jabbed out to square-leg
pushes this away for a single
short in length outside off, stabs it of the inside edge
short in length ,shovelled away to sweeper cover
works this to square-leg
Whack! Flighted on the leg and middle and TAylor has swung it over long-leg

And he is gone now, trying to repeat the shot. But this was not the off break but the carrom ball. He went for the big swing to the on side -one of his fav hits -but top edges it straight up. And NZ hurtle towards a big defeat
on the off stump line, pushed down to long-on
another carrom ball and the batsman is beaten, pushing inside the line
turns from the off, rolls of the pad to the on side
full in length outside off, square driven to the point boundary. He hit on the up. Top shot.
around the off stump line, defended to the off
leans across to square drive again but this time point intercepts
clipped towards vacant spaces in midwicket and they come back for the second run
lands on a length just outside leg and raps him on the pad

dropped by Ashwin and Nehra is really angry. . It was the bouncer and pulled towards deep square-leg. Ashwin was half-way in from the boundary and put his hands up but it bounded of his palms. Nehra is fuming.
turns in with bounce, stabbed to the on side
leans forward to work it wide of midwicket
It leaps from the rough .. extra bounce on Hopkins who checks his shot and the ball balloons to short third man fielder. The camera swings to Nehra who has a lovely wry smile!
leans across to push it to cover
leans across to defend but is beaten by the quicker one
turns in to the hit the pad
on the middle and leg, tapped to square-leg
leans forward to drive to mid-off
leans forward to tap this to midwicket
short in length, punched to cover
And again
lands outside off and turns away, left alone
leans forward to drive it back to the bowler
goes down on his knee to swing it towards deep square-leg where Virat stops it and passes it on to Raina
turns in towards the pads, rolls behind square-leg
low full toss, swerved away in the air, pushed down to long-on
Massive! He crashed this high over long-off! Boom.
on the pads, rolls away to the off side
in the zone outside off, goes for the reverse sweep but no wood on leather..
goes on the back foot to punch it to long-on
on the middle and leg, worked to midwicket
goes back and across to turn this past square-leg
quickish one, turns to the pad ..
leans forward to drag this to right of long-on
leans forward to drive it down to long-on
goes back to push it to the off
Whackity whack! He just thrust his front foot out and smashed this flighted delivery over long-on
goes for the sweep and it rolls behind square-leg
reverse sweeps this to point
works this one down to deep midwicket
in the zone outside off, swing and a miss
short delivery outside off and McCullum upper cuts it to the thirdman bounary
slightly slower, on the pads, rolls back down the pitch
Top shot! It was slightly short in length and outside off, McCullum plays a peachy cut shot to the backward point boundary
slower one, on a length,. eased to point
cut nicely towards wide third man where Sreesanth makes a tumbling save
slower bouncer, mistimes it to the on side
in the zone outside off, the slow leg cutter, McCullum is beaten, trying to run it down to third man
he leaned across to the off- and it was a full toss on the off stump line, and paddled it over short fine-leg fielder!
another slower one this time, pushed to covers
backs away and pushes this fullish delivery back to the bowler .. who tries to stop it and it rolls to the stumps after touching his fingers. McCullum had just about dragged his bat inside the line
moves outside leg and pushes it to cover for a single
around the off stump line, run down to third man
slower, on the off stump line, pushed to the off for a single
moves outside leg and Nehra bangs it in short. Swing and a miss results.
not quite in the blockhole but almost there, pushed out to cover
drags this to midwicket
stabs this to point for a single
slower one outside off, McCullum is slightly early into the shot and ends up dragging it down to long-on
Shot! He moved outside leg and drove this dipping full  toss inside out to the wide long-off boundary
the slower ones keep coming in from Munfa.. this one has been pushed down to long-off
backs away and clears mid-off .. It was the slower one and he was looking to lift it to the on side i reckon
Four more! Much fun here. This was the bouncer and McCullum top edges the pull shot over the keeper. The equation now is 49 from 37 balls
taps this towards cover for a single
gets forward to drive to mid-off
he moved outside leg, Nehra followed him, pushed out to point
leans forward to flick it past square-leg
fullish around off, squeezed back to the bowler
They keep coming. NZ stay in the game. This was a full toss outside off and Mills gets a fat edge on the drive down to third man boundary
full and straight, pushed back to the bowler

What a catch from the captain! McCullum carved it over covers - he didn't quite connect it but it still seemed he had cleared the field  .. Gautam dashed back from cover and lunged forward to take the ball dropping in from over his shoulder. A youtube moment. Reminds me of Roshan Mahanama. Fine innings but its over now
And India have won. It was the short delivery and Mills top edged the pull. It climbed ever so high until gravity started to drag it down. And Saha collects that. Game over.
